title: OT50: Opentecost
summary:
Key ideas:
- This is an open thread for readers to post whatever they want and ask random questions.
- The open thread will be posted publicly every second Sunday and privately on Wednesdays and other Sundays.
- Voting on comments will not be introduced as most people don't want it.
- The author has banned a user with the email address anon@gmail.com due to abuses.

Key learnings:
- None mentioned in the post.

Key questions:
- None mentioned in the post.
